channel.title: admin on Junjie Yan
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Junjie Yan

item.description: Junjie Yan is the CTO of Smart City Business Group and Vice Head of Research at SenseTime. He leads the R&D Team within Smart City Group to build systems and algorithms that make cities safer and more efficient. At SenseTime Research, he leads the Deep Learning Toolchian Team to build deep learning toolchain from algorithm components to distributed training and inference platform that enables deep learning solutions scale up to
